EmailTemplate.name: New Trial Notification For Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Blank Trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Adaptive Insights Blank Trial
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for registering for a free 30-day blank trial of the Adaptive Suite.
You're ready to start! Go to our Adaptive Insights Blank Trial forum and login with the credentials below.
Please start by downloading the forum files and following the instructions in the “Adaptive Insights Blank Trial.pdf” file.
https://support.adaptiveplanning.com/entries/24460287-Getting-Started-Building-a-Model-using-Trial-Software-Guide
Username: {!Contact.Trial_Username__c} Password: {!Contact.Trial_Password__c}
If you would like to work with a populated sample company instead of the blank model, please contact your account manager or email trialrequest@adaptiveinsights.com.
Best Regards, Trial Support, Adaptive Insights (650) 810-2293 trialsupport@adaptiveinsights.com
